    def __init__(self, proxy='http://127.0.0.1:8080'):
        self.zap = ZAPv2(proxies={'http': proxy, 'https': proxy})
        self.target = None
        
    def quick_scan_guide(self):
        """Quick scan guide (FREE!)"""
        print("== OWASP ZAP Quick Scan Guide (FREE!)\n")
        
        print("1. Start ZAP:\n")
        print("   # GUI Mode")
        print("   $ zap.sh  # Linux/Mac")
        print("   > zap.bat  # Windows\n")
        
        print("   # Headless Mode")
        print("   $ zap.sh -daemon -port 8080\n")
        
        print("   # Docker")
        print("   $ docker run -t zaproxy/zap-stable zap.sh -daemon\n")
        
        print("2. Basic Spider & Scan:")
        code = '''# Python example
from zapv2 import ZAPv2

zap = ZAPv2()
target = 'http://example.com'

# Spider the target
print('Spidering target...')
scan_id = zap.spider.scan(target)
while int(zap.spider.status(scan_id)) < 100:
    time.sleep(2)
    
# Active scan
print('Active scanning...')
scan_id = zap.ascan.scan(target)
while int(zap.ascan.status(scan_id)) < 100:
    time.sleep(5)
    
# Get alerts
alerts = zap.core.alerts(baseurl=target)
for alert in alerts:
    print(f"Alert: {alert['name']} - Risk: {alert['risk']}")'''
        
        print(code)
        print()
